scripts.build: npm run build:types && npm run build:js
scripts.build-zip: npm run build:js && npm run build-zip:zip
scripts.build-zip:zip: cp package.json ./lib/. && cp package-lock.json ./lib/. && mkdir -p dist && cd lib && zip -r ../dist/function.zip .
scripts.build-container: npm run build:js && npm run build-container:pack
scripts.build-container:pack: cd lib && cp ../package.json . && cp ../package-lock.json . && pack build --builder gcr.io/buildpacks/builder:v1 --env GOOGLE_FUNCTION_SIGNATURE_TYPE=http --env GOOGLE_FUNCTION_TARGET=entry my-function
scripts.deploy-gcloud: npm run build:js && npm run deploy-gcloud:gcloud-deploy
scripts.deploy-gcloud:gcloud-deploy: cp package.json ./lib/. && cp package-lock.json ./lib/. && cd lib && echo "Function name: ${FUNCTION_NAME:-my-function}" && echo "Region: ${REGION:-us-central1}" && gcloud functions deploy "${FUNCTION_NAME:-my-function}" --entry-point entry --runtime nodejs14 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region "${REGION:-us-central1}"
